    @allure.title("Test to verify that the Set Property Task Actions works as expected during execution")
    @allure.description("This testcase tests if set property task actions added on task gets triggered at "
                        "completion of the task during job execution")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cukjqxh")
    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.job
    @pytest.mark.set_property_task_action_triggered_at_completion_of_task

                                                              ("user_group", [])])
    def test_set_property_task_action_triggered_at_completion_of_task(self, user_group_creation, job_execution_by,
                                                                      users_list):
        process_data = self.process_obj.test_add_set_property_action_type_at_completion_of_task()

             process_data["properties"]["number_property"]: "10",
             process_data["properties"]["multi_select_property"]: [
                 process_data["properties"]["multi_select_option_02"]],
             process_data["properties"]["single_select_property"]: process_data["properties"][
                 "single_select_option_02"],
             process_data["properties"]["date_property"]: "12-12-2012",
             process_data["properties"]["date_time_property"]: datetime.now().strftime("%d-%m-%Y %H:%M")},
            process_data["properties"]["display_name"])
    
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.assign_user_and_user_group_to_process(job_execution_by, users_list, user_group_creation,
                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
    
        self.job_obj.start_job()
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["res_param"],
                                       data={"value": object_data["displayName"]})
